review: I think it is great to watch Amazon prime and Netflix on your TV. Super easy to set up and use within 5 minutes and for the price it is great. Would recommend.
author: Kathy Geraghty

review: It works well. I think that it may a bit confusing for older people. It does not get as many of the networks I had hoped for :-(
author: C. Larson

review: Great, but God help you if something goes wrong with it that is not covered in the forums, because Amazon won't. They are impossible to get hold of
author: E.D. "coffee slinger"

review: AWESOME!Easy install, navigation. Number 1 on my top purchases list
author: sarah barnett

review: Easy to hook up.  Easy to use.  Just didn't know it had to be plugged in the electric wall socket as well.  Make sure u have a near by plug
author: Mary Leighton

review: Amazing!! Great purchase say bye bye to cable TV !!
author: Gregory Doiron

review: Performs as advertised.  Easy to install
author: Ben Ray
